description:
My place is close to AquaMarina, Marcha cocina bar, Columbia Wine Co, High Bridge Tower, and The High Bridge. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the location, and the people. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

My place is centrally located and very close to all forms of public tranportation including one block away from the A train which runs express and can get you to time square in  15-20 min.

Near the cloisters and right in the middle of the Columbia University medical center and campus.

The A/C and 1 trains, and numerous buses. Only blocks from I-95 and the George Washington Bridge
name: Eclectic, relaxing yet steps away from the action
review: He made us feel home when we arrived. He was very nice and even walked us down to show us what we needed to know.
